name: BHAGWAN MANAV KALYAN SAMITI
briefDescription: Bhagwaan Manav kalian Samiti (BMKS)- is a civil society organization established in 2000 by a group of social activist after brainstorming and need assessment of the Mau district where the community people were deprived from all type of development indicators. The Organisation was further registered under Society act in 2002.The organization is working on Empowering the community through people participation by developing community based organization (CBOs) of women the major beneficiaries as well as the agent of social change, to cover the Women and children from deprived community through Women empowerment, Health(maternal health, Literacy, and livelihood. Presently organization is working in entire GPs of Ghosi Block. Organization has its strong faith on the principle of working of Mother Teresa,Mahatma Gandhi ,swami vivekanand and pandit Madan Mohan malviya.
